item.title: FHSAA receives allegation against Miami Northwestern football program
item.description: The Florida High School Athletic Association is once again looking Miami Northwestern's football program.

item.title: Democrats sue over access to 'Alligator Alcatraz' detention center
item.description: A group of Democratic state lawmakers who were denied entry to a controversial immigrant-detention center in the Everglades asked the Florida Supreme Court on Thursday to force Gov. Ron DeSantis “to provide immediate, unannounced access” to the remote facility, dubbed “Alligator Alcatraz” by state Republican leaders.

item.title: Make 38 pounds of nugget ice per day with this GE nugget ice maker
item.description: Do you have a nugget ice obsession? I will admit that Chick-Fil-A's ice istop tier. Now, you can enjoy your favorite ice at home with thisGE Profile Opal Countertop Nugget Ice Maker. The best part? It's 39% off at Amazon during the retailer'sPrime Day shopping event. It's also available in this gorgeous 'Moonstone Blue' to keep it from being an eyesore on your counters.

item.title: Immersive sound for less: Shop Prime Day gaming headset deals
item.description: For any dedicated gamer, whether you're an old pro or a casual gamer like I am, few things are as frustrating as yourheadsetfailing mid-match when you're trying to coordinate with your squad. This all-too-common frustration makesAmazon's current Prime Day deals(July 8-11) even more enticing.

item.title: Save 40% on my favorite vibey Govee floor lamp
item.description: If you’re cranking the AC and hiding indoors this July, it might be time to give your space a little refresh. And the easiest way to do that is by upgrading your home's lighting.
